name: Tecno Ronin
description:
If you are stuck, Press "P" to do a reset of the position

All the music and effects was made for the Jam

The techno shogun travels to the past to kill the shogun of the protagonist since in the future his descendants will kill him. 

In doing so, the protagonist swears revenge and follows him through a dimensional gap into the future. 

That makes him a ronin, a TecnoRonin

Assets:
